name: BERNINA ARTlink 7 Embroidery File
summary: An ART70 file is an embroidery design created by BERNINA ARTlink (version 7 or later), a free embroidery viewing and exporting application. It contains a design, which includes all of the information about the design, such as stitch placement, thread colors, and other metadata .

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: ART70 file open in BERNINA ARTlink 8
